title: FPS drops when I get into Laning Phase or rather when minions spawn.
body: I have around 140 fps or something like that at the beginning of a game, but than suddenly my FPS drops to like 30-60. Its pretty annoying. I have all my settings on low. Dont know what to do ^^.

replies.body:
Same
issue
for
2
months
now.

MSI GE72 2QE
Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4720HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz (8 CPUs), ~2.6GHz
12288MB RAM
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 965M

Could just be some general wear and tear our some outdated drivers.  There might even be some bad game files failing to render properly as the match goes on.  My suggestion would be go through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your PC and make sure everything's in good health.  :D
